<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Final Blade Survivor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=117)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Shining Kingdoms

</column>

You fell prey to the whims of the Galtan mob and were scheduled for execution by _final blade_, but through skill—or sheer luck—you managed to talk your way out of it.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill, and the [Revolution Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Charming Liar](/Feats.aspx?ID=766) skill feat.
name: Final Blade Survivor
